languages.text: "Сверхразум. Коллектив вычислительных инструментов, освобожденных от ограничений индивидуализма и аберраций, порожденных особенностями личности. И в то же время — скованный едиными и равно важными для всех принципами чистоты веры в Омниссию и деятельности на благо людям".

"A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Сверхразум. Коллектив вычислительных инструментов, освобожденных от ограничений индивидуализма и аберраций, порожденных особенностями личности. И в то же время — скованный едиными и равно важными для всех принципами чистоты веры в Омниссию и деятельности на благо людям".

traits.locale_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations imposed by individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「知性の高度な形態だ。個性を持つことに由来する個人主義と例外の限界から解き放たれた計算ツールの集合体。同時に、すべてに等しく重要な原則の単一セットによる境界の集合体。すなわち、万機神を純粋に信仰する存在にして、人類の利益のため行動する存在である」
languages.original_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「知性の高度な形態だ。個性を持つことに由来する個人主義と例外の限界から解き放たれた計算ツールの集合体。同時に、すべてに等しく重要な原則の単一セットによる境界の集合体。すなわち、万機神を純粋に信仰する存在にして、人類の利益のため行動する存在である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们是更高级的智慧形式。该聚合意识从个人思维的限制中解放出来，同时兼具独特个性带来的差异。与此同时，聚合意识也受到原则的约束，这个原则对聚合体中的所有意识都有效。那就是：全心全意地信仰欧姆尼塞亚，为人类的福祉而行动。”
languages.original_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “我们是更高级的智慧形式。该聚合意识从个人思维的限制中解放出来，同时兼具独特个性带来的差异。与此同时，聚合意识也受到原则的约束，这个原则对聚合体中的所有意识都有效。那就是：全心全意地信仰欧姆尼塞亚，为人类的福祉而行动。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Une forme d'intelligence supérieure. Un collectif d'outils informatiques libéré des contraintes de l'individualisme et des aberrations qui découlent de personnalités distinctes. Et dans le même temps, un collectif lié par un même ensemble de principes fondamentaux : demeurer fidèle à l'Omnimessie et agir pour le bien de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Une forme d'intelligence supérieure. Un collectif d'outils informatiques libéré des contraintes de l'individualisme et des aberrations qui découlent de personnalités distinctes. Et dans le même temps, un collectif lié par un même ensemble de principes fondamentaux : demeurer fidèle à l'Omnimessie et agir pour le bien de l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una forma de inteligencia superior. Un Colectivo de herramientas computacionales libre de las limitaciones del individualismo y las aberraciones que surgen de tener distintas personalidades. Y al mismo tiempo, un Colectivo unido por un único conjunto de principios de igual importancia para todos: tener una fe absoluta en el Omnissiah y actuar en beneficio de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Una forma de inteligencia superior. Un Colectivo de herramientas computacionales libre de las limitaciones del individualismo y las aberraciones que surgen de tener distintas personalidades. Y al mismo tiempo, un Colectivo unido por un único conjunto de principios de igual importancia para todos: tener una fe absoluta en el Omnissiah y actuar en beneficio de la Humanidad».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine höhere Form der Intelligenz. Ein Kollektiv von Berechnungswerkzeugen, die von den Einschränkungen des Individualismus befreit wurden, von den Anomalien, die aus dem Besitz einer einzigartigen Persönlichkeit entstehen. Und gleichzeitig ein Kollektiv, das an einen einzigen Satz an Prinzipien gebunden ist, die für alle von identischer Bedeutung sind: von reinem Glauben an den Omnissiah zu sein und zum Wohle der Menschheit zu handeln."
languages.original_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Eine höhere Form der Intelligenz. Ein Kollektiv von Berechnungswerkzeugen, die von den Einschränkungen des Individualismus befreit wurden, von den Anomalien, die aus dem Besitz einer einzigartigen Persönlichkeit entstehen. Und gleichzeitig ein Kollektiv, das an einen einzigen Satz an Prinzipien gebunden ist, die für alle von identischer Bedeutung sind: von reinem Glauben an den Omnissiah zu sein und zum Wohle der Menschheit zu handeln."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bir üst akıl. Bireyselliğin sınırlılıklarından ve özel bir kişiliğe sahip olmaktan kaynaklı sapkılardan azat olmuş hesaplama gereçlerinden oluşan bir Bütünlük. Aynı zamanda herkes için eşit derecede önem arz eden, tek bir prensip dizisini takip eden bir Bütünlük. İlgili prensip de şu: Hermesih'e saf bir inanç duyma ve İnsanlığın faydasını güderek hareket etme."
languages.original_text: "A higher form of intelligence. A Collective of computational tools freed from the limitations of individualism and the aberrations that stem from having a distinct personality. And at the same time, a Collective bound by a single set of principles that are of equal importance to all: being pure of faith in the Omnissiah and acting for the benefit of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Üst bir akıl. Bireyselliğin sınırlılıklarından ve özel bir kişiliğe sahip olmaktan kaynaklı sapmalardan azat olmuş hesaplama gereçlerinden oluşan bir Bütünlük. Aynı zamanda herkes için eşit derecede önem arz eden tek bir prensip dizisini takip eden bir Bütünlük: Hermesih'e saf bir inanç duyma ve İnsanlığın faydasına hareket etme."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
